entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.

Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
